QuoteDocument.name: QuoteDocument
QuoteDocument.description: Represents a quote in document format.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. If the organization has multicurrency and a Pricebook2Id specified on the quote, then the currency value of this field must match the currency of the PricebookEntry objects that are associated with any quote line items it has.

Discount.description: The discount for the quote used in the document.

Document.description: The binary data of the document stored in the QuoteDocument object.

DocumentTemplate.description: The ID of the template used to generate the document.

GrandTotal.description: Grand total for the quote used in the document.

QuoteId.description: ID for the quote used for the document.
